explains: adj. 有创造力的，善于创新的；发明的

sentences.en: He was amazingly inventive and resourceful, and played a major role in my career.
sentences.cn: 他极具创造力又足智多谋，在我的职业生涯中起了重要的作用。

sentences.en: She has a highly inventive mind.
sentences.cn: 她的头脑非常善于创新。

sentences.en: It inspired me to be more inventive with my own cooking.
sentences.cn: 它激励我在自己烹饪时更具创造力。
